definition: Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group
ardent/intense/fierce/stern/upright/to give one's life for a noble cause/exploits/achievements

sentences.english: Battle, in order to save a little girl, big heroic sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 战斗中，大个儿为了救一个小女孩，壮烈牺牲了。

sentences.english: The park showcased the statues of those martyrs who were killed during the failed uprising.
sentences.chinese: 陵园摆放着那些壮烈牺牲烈士们的石像。

sentences.english: Prepare yourselves for the greatest battle of your lives.
sentences.chinese: 准备迎接你一生中最壮烈的战斗吧。

sentences.english: Noble life, often of heroic sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 高尚的生活，常在壮烈的牺牲中。

sentences.english: That I live and you are gone.
She died heroical ly during an assault on the world's second-highest mountain.
sentences.chinese: 在向世界第二高峰的冲击中，她壮烈捐躯了。

sentences.english: The handful of soldiers fought bravely against the enemies and died heroic deaths.
sentences.chinese: 为数不少的战士们英勇抵抗，壮烈牺牲。

sentences.english: He fell into the enemy hands and died a martyr at the age of 26.
sentences.chinese: 他落入敌人手中，壮烈牺牲，那时才26岁。

sentences.english: This was, after all, the homage beauty was owed.
sentences.chinese: 总而言之，这就是值得钦佩的壮烈之美。

sentences.english: Many heroes died a martyr's death for the people's cause.
sentences.chinese: 许多英雄为人民的事业壮烈牺牲了。

sentences.english: His heroic swift and fierce dancing, soul sound of fear, with a heavy Yanzhao antiquity .
sentences.chinese: 其舞姿剽悍壮烈，声慑魂魄，具有浓重的燕赵古风。

definition: to view death as a return home/to not be afraid of dying/to face death with equanimity (idiom)
heroically sacrificing one's life (idiom); to sacrifice oneself fervently to the cause
lit. you can sing or you can cry (idiom); fig. deeply moving/happy and sad/inspiring and tragic
to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
